name: Mariluz Rodríguez
desc: La Mariluz va venir a Barcelona buscant una vida millor de la que tenia a Ecuador. Tot i que a l’inici no va ser gens fàcil, amb el temps s’ha integrat al barri i ara participa a totes les activitats locals com a voluntària.
descENG: Mariluz came to Barcelona in search of a better life than the one she had in Ecuador. Although things weren’t easy at first, over time she’s become part of the neighborhood, and now she takes part in all the local activities as a volunteer.
